# OSActionCancelHandler

**Type Alias**

The block to call after the successful cancellation of the action.

## Declaration

```swift
typedef void (^)(void) OSActionCancelHandler;
```

## Ending the Action Early

- **Cancel**: Cancels the execution of the action’s callbacks.
- **Aborted**: Calls the abort handler of the action object.
- **OSActionAbortedHandler**: The block to call before aborting an action object.
